feed.title: Parker lab resources
feed.subtitle: Useful materials for getting started with bioinformatics in the Parker lab at Caltech!

entry.title: Welcome to the Parker lab!
entry.content: We will store useful resources on this site to help you get started with computation here in the Parker lab. We primarily use Python and R for coding here, and operate on the computing power of Amazon Web Services as well as Caltech’s own high performance computing platform.
entry.summary: We will store useful resources on this site to help you get started with computation here in the Parker lab. We primarily use Python and R for coding here, and operate on the computing power of Amazon Web Services as well as Caltech’s own high performance computing platform.
